plot: Homer's marriage is in trouble when he develops an attraction to a new co-worker; Bart undergoes medical treatments that make him look like a nerd.

To satisfy gender equality guidelines, the power plant employs its first female worker: the highly attractive Mindy Simmons. Although Homer initially feels that they will have nothing in common, Mindy turns out to have the same slobbish tastes that he has, and he finds himself attracted to her. Temptation occurs when they are in the same hotel for a convention in Capital City but Homer ultimately remains faithful to Marge. Due to a temporary illness Bart has to wear thick glasses that make him resemble a nerd and he is picked on even more than usual by the school bullies.—don @ minifie-1
